attributes.action: Postpone Summer House of Commons recess until Brexit agreement has been reached.
attributes.background:
The deadline for Brexit is 31st October.
The PM has resigned and won't be replaced till mid July.
The House of Commons is about to go into a Summer recess from July 20 to September 5.
It has taken over 3 years to not reach an agreement so no more time can be wasted with the deadline so close.
